channel.title: (Self Titled) - sp33chl3ss [Chill, Electronic]
channel.description:
[Sp33chl3ss](https://soundcloud.com/superlativerxns/sp33chl3ss/s-lSdp7k1QHhM)
I think this track has the most potential reach out of any I've made. I tried very hard to be patient and keep the sound-space clear and decluttered. In other words, I went at it with much more intentional, deliberate instrument placement, and tried to give each of them their own space to shine.
Any listens/critiques are much appreciated.
